body_html:
To further confirm my suspicion I pointed the torch.half test to cuda:1 as in
dev_dtypes = [("cuda", torch.float), ("cuda:1", torch.float16)]
and the test passes

Is anyone in the community testing with cuda 9.1 , cudnn 7.0.5 with Volta GPUs?
body_text:
To further confirm my suspicion I pointed the torch.half test to cuda:1 as in

Is anyone in the community testing with cuda 9.1 , cudnn 7.0.5 with Volta GPUs?
body:
To further confirm my suspicion I pointed the torch.half test to cuda:1 as in 
dev_dtypes = [("cuda", torch.float), ("cuda:1", torch.float16)]
and the test passes

Is anyone in the community testing with cuda 9.1 , cudnn 7.0.5 with Volta GPUs?
